TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 和 路由事件的資料，以及相關附加事件和預覽事件。

span.span: Provides data for the and routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件資料類別會搭配下列附加的事件：This event data class is used with the following attached events: - - - - 此事件資料類別也搭配基底項目上的下列路由事件。This event data class is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - 附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 索引鍵可以是最新和已切換之狀態或在清單中，並切換的狀態。A key can be in both the up and toggled states or the down and toggled states. 基於這個理由，決定是否已啟動的索引鍵或向下不只要檢查以數值形式的值。For this reason, determining whether a key is up or down is not as simple as checking the value as a numeric value. 相反地，您應該檢查此值將它視為旗標列舉。Instead, you should check the value by treating it as a flag enumeration. 使用`AND`比較的第一個位元。Use an `AND` comparison of the first bit. 或者，使用協助程式屬性， ，和來判斷是否指定索引鍵已啟動、 關閉，或切換。Alternatively, use the helper properties , , and to determine whether a given key is up, down, or toggled.

param.span: 與這個事件相關聯的邏輯鍵盤裝置。

span.span: The logical keyboard device associated with this event.
The input source.
The time when the input occurred.
The key referenced by the event.

public: property System::Windows::Input::Key DeadCharProcessedKey { System::Windows::Input::Key get(); };

summary.span: 取得屬於廢鍵組合 (Dead Key Composition) 之一部分的按鍵，以建立單一組合 (Combined) 字元。

span.span: Gets the key that is part of dead key composition to create a single combined character.

value.span: 屬於廢鍵組合之一部分的按鍵，以建立單一組合字元。

span.span: The key that is part of dead key composition to create a single combined character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 廢鍵，當按下，會產生任何可見的字元，但是會指出索引鍵是結合所產生的下一個字母按鍵的字元。A dead key, when pressed, produces no visible character but indicates that the key is to be combined with the character produced by the next letter key pressed. 如果傳回，您可以使用這個屬性取得輸入的實際金鑰。If returns , you can use this property to get the actual key that was entered.

span.span: Gets the keyboard key referenced by the event, if the key will be processed by an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)].
The referenced by the event.

param.name: genericHandler
param.span: 以特定型別的方式呼叫的泛型處理常式。

span.span: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.

param.span: 對其呼叫處理常式的目標。

summary.span: 以型別專屬的方式叫用事件處理常式，這樣做能夠提升事件系統的效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會轉換為一般處理常式時為然後再叫用。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 如需這項實作模式及它的理由的詳細資訊，請參閱和[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

summary.span: 取得與這個事件關聯的鍵盤按鍵狀態。

span.span: Gets the state of the keyboard key associated with this event.
The state of the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵可以是最新和已切換之狀態或在清單中，並切換的狀態。A key can be in both the up and toggled states or the down and toggled states. 基於這個理由，決定是否已啟動的索引鍵或向下不只要檢查以數值形式的值。For this reason, determining whether a key is up or down is not as simple as checking the value as a numeric value. 相反地，您應該檢查此值將它視為旗標列舉。Instead, you should check the value by treating it as a flag enumeration. 使用`AND`比較的第一個位元。Use an `AND` comparison of the first bit. 或者，使用協助程式屬性， ，和來判斷是否指定索引鍵已啟動、 關閉，或切換。Alternatively, use the helper properties , , and to determine whether a given key is up, down, or toggled. ## Examples 下列範例會檢查是否索引鍵相關聯的執行個體是向執行位元`AND`上的比較索引鍵和列舉值。The following example checks whether a key associated with an instance of is down by performing a bitwise `AND` comparison on the of the key and the enumeration value. [!code-csharp[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyStatesDown](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keyeventargskeystatesdown)] [!code-vb[keyargssnippetsample#KeyEventArgsKeyStatesDown](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyArgsSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keyeventargskeystatesdown)]
